Rulings.Edison: ●If your “Guard Dog’s” Flip Effect resolves, and then later “Cyber Jar” is flipped face-up, your opponent won't be able to Special Summon any of the monsters they pick up, and any monsters that would normally be Special Summoned will be destroyed instead.
